thread.title: Mayor questions RTA traffic and safety studies that support reopening Public Square to buses
thread.title_full: Mayor questions RTA traffic and safety studies that support reopening Public Square to buses

author: Ginger Christ, The Plain Dealer
title: Mayor questions RTA traffic and safety studies that support reopening Public Square to buses
text: Mayor Frank Jackson says more information needs to be collected safety and traffic studies on Public Square are not yet complete.
